## waitAtLeast() function

Given a `Promise`<!-- -->, wait a minimum period of time before resolving.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function waitAtLeast<T>(minimumWaitMs: number, promise: Promise<T> | PromiseLike<T>): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

minimumWaitMs


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The minimum wait time in milliseconds.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

promise


</td><td>

Promise&lt;T&gt; \| PromiseLike&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

The `Promise` to wait for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;T&gt;

## Remarks

Useful for delaying near instantaneous actions that might affect UI.

## Example


```ts
const result = await waitAtLeast(2000, promise);
```
